reviewText:
This is the story I dreamed of when I was in school.  Most students at one time or another have a crush on a favorite teacher.  For me, no exception.

This DVD started out great as Momone is being held down, panties stripped off, and prodded by her female classmates.  She wakes up from her nightmare (which actually happened to her when she was a child).  Momone is a beautiful High School Art teacher in which all the boys in school are totally turned on by he good looks.  One boy named Hino (class troublemaker) takes advantage of the teacher by rubbing up next to her in the school pool that sexually turns her on.  Hino then secretly follows Momone home in which she gives in to his sexual demands.  Before long, Momone craves Hino's sex and becomes his sex slave.

While Momone is sexually aroused with Hino, Hino doesn't care about her.  He just wants to prove to his friends he can do anything he wants.  He calls and demands Momone to go to school without a bra and panties.  The next day in art class, Hino tells Momone to disrobe which she does.  All the young boys in class become excited and want to performing sex with her.  Momone, who at first was embarrassed, gives in to the boys sexual drive.  She herself becomes sexually arroused.

Odoe, another boy in school (who also is in love with Momone), becomes angered by Hino's control over Momone and storms out of the classroom.

After the young boys were finished having sex with Momone, Hino picks Momone up and says "Show-Time is over now." and that's how the movie ends!!!  What about Odoe?  What about Momone?  What happens next? The movie ended too abruptly making Momone seem like a tramp.

I would have easily given this DVD 5 stars, but it ended too abruptly and with out a decent ending.  I would have ended the movie with Odoe beating the crap out of Hino; and then Odoe and Momone allope to another city.  Odoe was the only one who actually loved and showed passion for Momone.  Since this video is only 30 minutes long, I guess the writer/artist just ran out of time.  I'm hoping there is a sequel in the near future.

Amazon needs to show the images of the hentai's that are from nutech studios, their's no full nudity on the front cover.

The story opens with a nightmare, in which several girls take Momone's underwear off and make a display of her to the boys. Apparently, this was something that actually happened whem Momone was a student.
